Articles.Content:
so i have big problemo with my RP-1 install. i keep getting a NRE and theres the full output from KSP.log:

[EXC 17:08:52.902] NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
    KSP.UI.Screens.RDTechTree.LoadTechTitles (System.String filePath, System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[TKey,TValue] dict) (at <c1858a3f77504bd1aaa946fdccf84670>:0)
    ResearchAndDevelopment.GetTechnologyTitle (System.String techID) (at <c1858a3f77504bd1aaa946fdccf84670>:0)
    KERBALISM.Configure.Specs () (at <a75d750d847648a1b67425bc638411a7>:0)
    KERBALISM.Configure.GetInfo () (at <a75d750d847648a1b67425bc638411a7>:0)
    PartLoader.CompilePartInfo (AvailablePart newPartInfo, Part part) (at <c1858a3f77504bd1aaa946fdccf84670>:0)
    PartLoader+<CompileParts>d__56.MoveNext () (at <c1858a3f77504bd1aaa946fdccf84670>:0)
    UnityEngine.SetupCoroutine.InvokeMoveNext (System.Collections.IEnumerator enumerator, System.IntPtr returnValueAddress) (at <5aeafee3fea24f37abd1315553f2cfa6>:0)
    UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
    ModuleManager.UnityLogHandle.InterceptLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
    UnityEngine.Debug:CallOverridenDebugHandler(Exception, Object)

jesus christ someone help me

ok after looking into it i have found a possible cause: ksp wan trying to find TechTree.cfg in he reascources folder but TechTree.cfg was just chilling in the squad folder not in any speific folder. the NRE is the game trying to load the techtree and failing. i have put Techtree.cfg back and it works!
